overview: Lori is an aspiring model straight off the bus from Texas. She has the misfortune to meet Rick, a small-time con-man who convinces her he can manage her career. All he manages is to get her in front of every nudie photographer in town. Her loss, your gain. Vivid presents fresh and shy, Lori Michaels, in "Cheap Shot," her virgin appearance in front adult cameras.
tagline: It may be your only shot
title: Cheapshot
